name: Animelo
description:
This is Animelo, it is just about two teams steeling gold each other by shooting, hitting, FPS, this game is mainly about Co-op with your fiend so you should play with your friend, 

How to play?

SinglePlayer -> not support yet

Multiplayer -> create a room by clicking host, if you are a client input the IP address to joint

1. Wait for all players to join the game.

2. Name your player, pick team, and time then "Ready"

3. Host "Start" to play the game.

Each team will have a mount of gold from the start, and it will randomly go up or down, your objective is to get more gold than your competitive team by stealing, killing, shooting, ...

You can follow how game is doing on: here

Thank you!
